snippet.title: MASTER The New Matriarch Boss In ARC Raiders | Gameplay Strategy, Legendary Loot, & More!
snippet.description:
ARC Raiders newest boss, The Matriarch has been deployed Topside and she's just as formidable as you might think. In this video Codiak and Livid break down the best gameplay strategies for defeating the boss, the valuable loot you can claim, and how to position yourself to defeat the Matriarch every time.

0:00 Intro
0:38 Matriarch Abilities
3:30 Spawn Locations & Behavior 
4:05 Gameplay Tactics & Weakspots (PVE & PVP)
9:08 Loot & New Legendary Weapon
11:29 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders
